metadata.name: Destruction of Monotony
metadata.description:
This NFT was inspired by the golden days of the pixel era. I think none of us will forget those incredible days behind the Super Nintendo, when we were glued to the screen. 

Do you remember the last game you played? 

I bet you never imagined that was the last time you played it.. The very last time â€¦

They say that in order to create you have to destroy, kill your darlings, this is a tribute to that.

I hope you enjoy this crazy trip with me.

( The genesis owner will get the non-explosive version NFT for free ! )
